resourceTemplates.name: ecb-dataflows
resourceTemplates.title: ECB dataflows
resourceTemplates.description: Lists all available dataflows in the ECB Data Portal (SDMX). Use this to discover FLOW_IDs (e.g., EXR, ICP, BSI).

resourceTemplates.name: ecb-data-query
resourceTemplates.title: ECB data query
resourceTemplates.description: Generic SDMX data query for any ECB dataflow. Provide flowRef (e.g., EXR or AGENCY,EXR,latest) and a SDMX seriesKey (e.g., D.USD.EUR.SP00.A). Supports date ranges, deltas, detail level, history, observation limits and output format.

resourceTemplates.name: ecb-exr-spot-latest
resourceTemplates.title: ECB EXR spot latest
resourceTemplates.description: Convenience template for ECB exchange rates (EXR). Quickly fetch the latest N observations for a currency pair. Default example mimics the common daily ECB reference rate series.
